Cryptocurrency-Banking

The Rise And Development Of Crypto-ATMs In The Present Future

As the ever-growing demand for [Decentralized Digital Assets] grows more and more, the reliance on Blockchain Technology has become significant in moving & recording these asset transactions happening on the Blockchain Network from Cryptocurrencies or Hardware wallets.

As the world of finance moves closer towards mass adoption for this type of technology it has increased the complexity of operating this hence making it not usable by less tech-savvy users.

Hence why we have introduced a cleaner & more time-saving approach for everyone using these decentralized assets like cryptocurrencies etc. Which will help them in converting their coins into FIAT currency like INR & have it deposited within the user's bank account directly within a matter of few seconds using our online Cryptocurrency-ATM website built on FLASK [A Python Web Framework] & various other frameworks and languages to support the full functioning of this site security.

Facts: Today, there are over 5,000 Bitcoin ATMs across the globe, according to Coin ATM Radar. From New York to Hong Kong, Moscow to London, and Buenos Aires to Sydney, you will find Bitcoin ATMs. Even the small African nation of Djibouti is home to a Bitcoin teller machine. The more bitcoin awareness and adoption grows, the more entrepreneurs are installing Bitcoin ATMs in an attempt to benefit from the” bitcoin gold rush.”

Services of Crypto-ATM

Crypto ATMs use an internet-based cryptocurrency portal to manage transactions.The users deposit their cash and the machine converts the cash into crypto and sends the funds to your Cypto wallet wherein you send and receive all your crypto funds.

Easy to use

All you have to do is follow a simple and clear step by step process when using our ATMs. You do not need to set up an account, online wallet, or deal with lengthy public keys. Your receipt contains a QR code, with the public and private key, which can be scanned and immediately recognized by standard wallet apps, if you have one.

Network fees

The transaction fees on a Crypto-ATM are generally between 0.1 and 0.2 USDT which is equal to 8-14 INR per transaction.

Lowest Deposit & Withdrawal Amount

Generally the minimum Withdrawal amount is $20 and Deposit amount is $2

Security

Currently, the cryptocurrency ATM infrastructure is running on Heroku, a platform that is operated and managed by developers. To send, receive & record transactions, the cryptocurrency nodes are connected to the "TRON" Network which has one of the lowest transaction fees. The use of Zero Knowledge ATMs will provide even greater anonymity for security while preserving greater decentralization in the future.

Immediacy

Cryptocurrency ATMs can complete transactions in few minutes. For buy order, as soon as money has been inserted into our ATM, a purchase is executed for the total payment amount. If you’re looking to make a sell order, cryptocurrency ATMs make it so that you no longer need to wait several days to receive cash.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Is Crypto ATM Reliable?

    Crypto ATMs are one of the safest ways to buy, send or sell coins. First, instant transactions protect you from Crypto coins volatility. Secondly, passwords and 2-factor authentication protect your account from others.

  • How long does a Crypto ATM transaction take?

    Crypto ATM purchases are instant. Account verification takes only a few minutes, and purchasing coins is even faster. However, coin sales must be confirmed on the blockchain. This confirmation involves a third party.

  • Is there any fee while making a transaction in Crypto ATM?

    As with any bitcoin exchange, Crypto ATMs also charge a fee per transaction. Depending on the Crypto ATM or kiosk provider, these fees can be as low as 6.99% or as high as 20%.

  • Do Crypto-ATM accept any type of debit/credit cards?

    Crypto-ATM kiosks look like traditional ATMs, but do not connect to a bank account and instead connect the user directly to a Crypto wallet or exchange.
